column4: i have some network/router questions for anyone who is inclined :)
i'm on a router with 2 other computers
what are some commands or GUI programs to help show me their ip's
and other options such as networking
ping <name>
nslookup <name>
<name>?
the name of the computer you want the ip of
is there a way of obtaining that info just from them being connected?
you could look in your routers dhcp table
so i need to someone access my router info?  hmm...lol
yeah, web browse to its ip and login, there will be a list there
do you know where i could obtain info on how to log into the router
ifconfig, its your default gateway ip
any idea how i can find my username/pass
lol, i've been googling it
if you didnt change it then it'll be the default in the manual
got it!
hmm i can't nslookup either the ip or the <name>
i thought you wanted the ip from the name?
i got both ip and name, not i just want to play around with some commands
nslookup and ping conert names to ips and ips to names
i didn't really understand that :(
